fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose 3 players to Shoulder Charge. If they're not evil, you roleblock them. If you target the Ball-carrier, steal possession of the Ball.
- At night, you may instead Whine, causing another player to be Yellow Carded. One use.
- The day after using Shoulder Charge, you will be Yellow Carded unless at least one of your targets was the Ball-carrier, forcing you to not be able to speak as if you were blackmailed. (If for some reason, you were forced to speak under blackmail, you would say "I am Yellow Carded".)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Factional chat
- Gains powerful defense if carrying the Ball
- Replaces abilities with factional kill if carrying the Ball

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the team.
